그리고 강: <svg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='river1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='50%' style='stop-color:#E1F5FE;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='river2' x1='0%' y1='100%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#C8E6C9;stop-opacity:0.8'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1F5FE;stop-opacity:0.8'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='glow1'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:0.6'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:0'/></radialGradient><filter id='shadow1'><feGaussianBlur in='SourceAlpha' stdDeviation='8'/><feOffset dx='0' dy='4' result='offsetblur'/><feFlood flood-color='#B4E7F4' flood-opacity='0.4'/><feComposite in2='offsetblur' operator='in'/><feMerge><feMergeNode/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter></defs><ellipse cx='100' cy='100' rx='90' ry='90' fill='url(#glow1)' opacity='0.3'/><path d='M 30,80 Q 60,60 90,80 T 150,80 Q 170,90 180,110' stroke='url(#river1)' stroke-width='20' fill='none' opacity='0.7' filter='url(#shadow1)'/><path d='M 25,100 Q 50,85 80,100 T 140,105 Q 165,115 185,130' stroke='url(#river2)' stroke-width='18' fill='none' opacity='0.6' filter='url(#shadow1)'/><path d='M 20,115 Q 45,100 75,115 T 135,120 Q 160,130 190,145' stroke='url(#river1)' stroke-width='15' fill='none' opacity='0.5'/><ellipse cx='70' cy='75' rx='8' ry='8' fill='#E1F5FE' opacity='0.6'/><ellipse cx='130' cy='95' rx='6' ry='6' fill='#C8E6C9' opacity='0.5'/></svg>
